original_text: Bar-Jesus was also called Elymas. That was his name in the Greek language. He did not like what Barnabas and Saul were saying. He did not want Sergius Paulus to believe in Jesus. So he tried to stop him.
korean_text: 이 마술사 엘루마는 (이 이름을 번역하면 마술사라) 그들을 대적하여 총독으로 믿지 못하게 힘쓰니

sentences.original_text: That was his name in the Greek language.
He did not like what Barnabas and Saul were saying.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 바나바와 사울이 하는 말을 좋아하지 않았습니다.

sentences.original_text: He did not want Sergius Paulus to believe in Jesus.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 세르기오 바울로가 예수를 믿지 않기를 원했습니다.

sentences.original_text: So he tried to stop him.
